no-restricted-imports.name: vue
no-restricted-imports.message: Do not manually import from 'vue' in a Nuxt project. Nuxt automatically provides Vue APIs. If you are not using Nuxt, override this rule.

no-restricted-imports.name: @vueuse/core
no-restricted-imports.message: Do not manually import VueUse utilities in Nuxt. Use auto-imports instead. If you are not using Nuxt, override this rule.

no-restricted-imports.name: #app
no-restricted-imports.message: Do not import from '#app'. These APIs are auto-imported in Nuxt. If you are not using Nuxt, override this rule.

no-restricted-imports.name: vue-router
no-restricted-imports.message: Do not manually import from 'vue-router' in Nuxt. Use the router composables provided by auto-imports. If you are not using Nuxt, override this rule.
